name: OR_LNLG_SAFE_PREC
description: This table contains the safety precaution information for the surgical/invasive procedure log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SAFETY_PREC_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number of the safety precaution taken to protect patient during equipment use.
